item.title: Maryland bill creating commission to study, recommend slavery reparations heads to governor's desk
item.description: Maryland lawmakers have advanced a bill aimed at creating a commission to study and recommend potential slavery reparations to Gov. Wes Moore's desk.

item.title: One Republican senator voted against confirming Trump nominee Harmeet Dhillon
item.description: Sen. Lisa Murkowski was the only Republican senator to vote against confirming Trump nominee Harmeet Dhillon to serve as assistant attorney general.

item.title: Tariffs a Harsh New Demonstration of the Folly of Economic Planners
item.description: Trump has engineered something like a sanctions regime targeting Americans.

item.description: Lawfare comes for Marine Le Pen.

item.title: Tariffs Are The Only Way To Restore America’s Long-Term Economic Health
item.description: To make America make things again, tariffs are the only option.

item.title: Mastercard Backtracks After Getting Caught Using Ad Dollars To Censor Conservatives
item.description: The $500 billion corporation that was 'instrumental in the formation' of the GARM censorship machine has apparently reversed course.

item.title: From MLB To Coca-Cola, Woke Corporations Refuse To Apologize For Smearing Georgia’s Election Integrity Law
item.description: Major League Baseball, Coca-Cola, and Delta Air Lines are refusing to apologize for smearing Georgia's election integrity law.

item.title: After Years of Woke Shows, MAGA Comes for the Smithsonian
item.description: Enforcing Trump’s EO on ‘Restoring Truth and Sanity to American History’ will take tough love, force, and deprogramming, and it won’t be pretty.

item.title: The ‘Anti-Trans’ Oxford Event That Wasn’t ‘Canceled’
item.description: People are increasingly willing to reject obvious falsehoods, and activists are decreasingly effective at intimidation.

item.title: Americans Will Pay the Price for Reckless Tariffs
item.description: As a share of the economy, President Trump’s executive order is likely the largest peacetime tax increase in U.S. history.

item.title: The Fight Against The Censorship-Industrial Complex Is Not Over
item.description: Those who would keep the truth from U.S. citizens must be rooted out. We need a full accounting of what happened when transparency failed.
